A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a love it or hate it kind of movie... and I love it. It wasn't what I expected but it had s lot of good. Holdo is Amazing\, Leia is wonderful- and I loved that scene. Fight me- and Rey\, while not how I pictured her\, is beautiful. Some parts were a little cheesy yeah\, but uh it's a children's/Faily movie what do you expect? Especially since it's sci-fi. I greatly enjoyed it.
